HEADER.title: Step away from sore feet with Bähler custom made insoles
HEADER.subtitle: Effective relief from:
HEADER.description1: Whether it is for sports, diabetes or everyday use, this extremely individual design allows us to achieve not only the correct fitting but also the desired wearing comfort.
HEADER.description2: From RMB 1,000 with free delivery - direct from Zurich, Switzerland
HEADER.description3: And now available for the first time in China!

REGISTER.description: We’re currently building this innovative new product, please enter your email to have first access when we are ready to launch
REGISTER.thanks.description: We’ll be in touch once we are ready to launch our exciting new product.

FAQS.head: FAQs
FAQS.faq1-answer: You simply need to take three photographs of each foot using our easy to use, guided app and using AI techniques and that’s enough to build a highly accurate 3d model of each foot. Once this is done you just have to place your order and we do the rest.
FAQS.faq2-answer: We compare your scans with our database of over 500,000 feet, this combined with complex mathematical algorithms means we can very accurately produce custom profiles of your feet from 3 images of each foot.
FAQS.faq3-answer: From the time you place the order we aim to have your insoles delivered to your door within 2 weeks.
FAQS.faq4-question: Why are they made in Switzerland?
FAQS.faq4-answer: Switzerland is renowned for producing high quality products and we are no different. How production facility offers the very best in premium insole quality, capable of withstanding the demands required through heavy usage.
FAQS.faq5-question: Do I have to scan my feet every time I want to place an order?
FAQS.faq5-answer: No, you do this only once and then your 3d feet profile is saved against your account meaning you can re order at any time simply by placing an order.

ABOUT.head: About
ABOUT.description:
Based in Zurich, Switzerland for more than 60 years, Bähler AG has led the way in terms of innovative solutions for the orthopedic care and rehabilitation sector.

We work with highly regarded specialist clinics to drive innovation, seeking new materials or production techniques that deliver pain relief to patients of all ages. We have a deep understanding of our patients needs and requirements and its this that drives us to continuously improve and develop our products and services.

QUESTION2.ques: What of the following best describes you?

RESULT1.option.1: Custom made - to the profile of you feet.
RESULT1.option.3: Good value - Exercise with peace of mind.

RESULT2.result: Physical activities like running can over time, place additional pressure on your feet, legs and spine which over time can lead to pain. Wearing insoles ensures you maintain correct posture even when engaging in exercise.
